de.mrapp.android.preference.activity.adapter

Interface AdapterListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PreferenceActivity

    public interface AdapterListener
    Defines the interface, a class, which should be notified, when the underlying data of a PreferenceHeaderAdapter has been changed, must implement.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Michael Rapp

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onPreferenceHeaderAdded(PreferenceHeaderAdapter adapter, PreferenceHeader preferenceHeader, int position)
      The method, which is invoked, when a preference header has been added to the adapter.
      void onPreferenceHeaderRemoved(PreferenceHeaderAdapter adapter, PreferenceHeader preferenceHeader, int position)
      The method, which is invoked, when a preference header has been removed from the adapter.

    • Method Detail

      • onPreferenceHeaderAdded

        void onPreferenceHeaderAdded(PreferenceHeaderAdapter adapter,
                           PreferenceHeader preferenceHeader,
                           int position)
        The method, which is invoked, when a preference header has been added to the adapter.
        Parameters:
        adapter - The obtained adapter as an instance of the class PreferenceHeaderAdapter
        preferenceHeader - The preference header, which has been added to the adapter, as an instance of the class PreferenceHeader
        position - The position of the preference header, which has been added, as an Integer value

      • onPreferenceHeaderRemoved

        void onPreferenceHeaderRemoved(PreferenceHeaderAdapter adapter,
                             PreferenceHeader preferenceHeader,
                             int position)
        The method, which is invoked, when a preference header has been removed from the adapter.
        Parameters:
        adapter - The obtained adapter as an instance of the class PreferenceHeaderAdapter
        preferenceHeader - The preference header, which has been removed from the adapter, as an instance of the class PreferenceHeader
        position - The position of the preference header, which has been removed, as an Integer value
